title: some incorrect handling (forgetting to git annex merge or smth) in install/create/publish cycle

milestone.title: BF-crawl-publish-cycle
milestone.description: There is a growing number of little annoying issues to be fixed for smooth(er) publication cycle

body:
``` shell
$> datalad --version
datalad 0.2.3.dev947

$> datalad install ///openfmri/ds000001
2016-09-15 08:31:25,942 [INFO   ] Installing <Dataset path=/tmp/ds000001> from http://datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000001 (install.py:372)
1 installed item is available at
<Dataset path=/tmp/ds000001>

$> builtin cd ds000001 
W: git-annex repositories not (yet) supported in the prompt

$> echo 123.mp3 > 123.mp3; echo 123 > 123; git annex add 123 123.mp3; git commit -m 'added some files'                                                            add 123 ok                 
add 123.mp3 ok
(recording state in git...)
[master 8b50d9c] added some files
 2 files changed, 2 insertions(+)
 create mode 120000 123
 create mode 120000 123.mp3

$> datalad create-publication-target-sshwebserver -r --shared all --existing=replace localhost:/tmp/ds000001-publish upload                                       
2016-09-15 08:31:39,606 [INFO   ] Connecting ... (create_publication_target_sshwebserver.py:209)
2016-09-15 08:31:39,744 [INFO   ] Creating target dataset ds000001 at /tmp/ds000001-publish (create_publication_target_sshwebserver.py:239)
2016-09-15 08:31:39,946 [INFO   ] Adjusting remote git configuration (create_publication_target_sshwebserver.py:287)
2016-09-15 08:31:39,975 [INFO   ] Enabling git post-update hook ... (create_publication_target_sshwebserver.py:307)
2016-09-15 08:31:40,131 [INFO   ] Uploading web interface to /tmp/ds000001-publish hopa:/tmp/ds000001

$> datalad publish --to=upload
2016-09-15 08:32:12,478 [INFO   ] Publishing dataset <Dataset path=/tmp/ds000001> to sibling upload ... (publish.py:270)
2016-09-15 08:32:12,662 [INFO   ] [new branch] (publish.py:46)
2016-09-15 08:32:12,836 [ERROR  ] [remote rejected] (non-fast-forward) (publish.py:44)
1 item was published:
Dataset: /tmp/ds000001
```

note above `remote rejected` which btw didn't fail datalad call altogether (as it should've imho)

and I think it was rejected since didn't merge upload/git-annex branch locally before trying to push it out
